name: REDBOW
description:
REDBOW is a topdown rougelite made for ludum dare 38.

Timelapse

Kill all enemies to open the path deeper into the dungeon. Get as deep as possible. Can you reach level 10?

Controls:

Move: WASD
Shoot: Arrow keys
Roll: Spacebar, select in menus.
Toggle sound: M

You don't take damage while rolling.
